steps.description: Heat-Heat 3 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat
Add-Add 1/4 tsp mustard to the pan
Chop-Chop tomato roughly (anysize chunks are fine)

steps.modified_description: Peel-Peel 2 instead of 4 large garlic cloves

errors.description: only 2 garlic are peeled and minced instead of 4

steps.description: puree-puree tomatoes without any water in a blender/mixer
Add-1/2 tsp cumin seeds to the pan
add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle, add minced garlic
steps.modified_description: add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle and burn them, add minced garlic and spill it
Saute-Saute the garlic for 1 min and burn the garlic

errors.description: saute the garlic only for 1 min and burn it

steps.description: mix-mix well contents of the pan
Add-1/2 tsp salt to the pan
Add-Add tomato puree to the pan
Mix-Mix well tomato puree with contents in the pan
simmer-Allow the mixture to simmer over low heat for 5 minutes or until the mixture becomes thick
steps.modified_description: simmer-Allow the mixture to simmer over low heat for 1 minute instead of 5 minutes or until the mixture becomes thick

steps.description: Take-Take the pan off the heat
Transfer-Transfer it to a serving bowl

errors.description: Add-Add 2 tbsp red chili powder to the pan
